title: when did i join?
body: just wanted to know how much time i've been playing league for ??

replies.body: Couldn't say.  ><  Our account team asks players when they believe their account was made as a verification step, so we don't tell players when their account was created.  I usually just go by how many seasons I've played, if that helps.

If you happened to have purchased skins around the time you started or some time within that year, you can see the years that your skins were purchased in your collections tab. If you remember purchasing a specific skin upon its release, you can find the date it was released. You could use either of these to estimate a possible date. Honestly, if I were asked when my account was made, I couldn't give an exact month, or even an exact year. However, I could provide a lot of information of where I lived during possible years that I may have created the account if I ever needed to prove myself the owner of my own account.
